title: I think Riot is way too strict when it comes to punishments
body: I do realize Riot has a 4 strike rule, but my last punishment was a month or two months ago, why is my next punishment after 1 month or 2 worth a perma. In fact how is this even a perma ban? I do realize ff 15 can be tilting to some people, but come on, this is just insane. If you're going to be this strict with the chat you might as well remove it from the game. Meanwhile the people that actually ruin my games on purpose go unpunished.
